title: Pressure Cooker Corned Beef Recipe
description: This pressure cooker corned beef is perfectly seasoned and produces the most tender, flavorful corned beef in half the time it would take to braise.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Main Dishes Roast Recipes Pressure Cooker Corned Beef 4.7 (48) 39 Reviews 8 Photos This pressure cooker corned beef is the most tender, flavorful corned beef that you will ever eat! Cooking time includes the time for the pot to reach the proper pressure. Submitted by Christina Updated on February 10, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 8 8 8 8 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 1 hr 40 mins Additional Time: 10 mins Total Time: 2 hrs Servings: 10 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 10 servings 1 (4 pound) corned beef brisket, seasoning packet discarded 1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder 1 ½ teaspoons onion powder 1 (12 ounce) bottle beer Directions Gather all ingredients. ALLRECIPES / ANA CADENA Place brisket fat-side up on a rack inside an electric pressure cooker. Sprinkle garlic powder and onion powder over brisket; pour beer into the pot. ALLRECIPES / ANA CADENA Close and lock the lid. Select "Meat" setting according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 1 hour 30 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build. ALLRECIPES / ANA CADENA Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid. ALLRECIPES / ANA CADENA Transfer brisket to a cutting board; remove the top layer of fat and slice across the grain. ALLRECIPES / ANA CADENA Cook’s Note I like to slice the cooked brisket with an electric knife for beautifully sliced meat. I Made It Print 113 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 222 Calories 15g Fat 2g Carbs 15g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 10 Calories 222 % Daily Value * Total Fat 15g 20% Saturated Fat 5g 26% Cholesterol 80mg 27% Sodium 923mg 40% Total Carbohydrate 2g 1% Dietary Fiber 0g 0% Total Sugars 0g Protein 15g 30% Vitamin C 0mg 0% Calcium 9mg 1% Iron 2mg 8% Potassium 135mg 3% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Pressure Cooker Corned Beef 01 of 08 Photo by  ALLRECIPES / ANA CADENA 02 of 08 Photo by  Ana 01/16/2024 This was so easy to make and the beef was so flavorful and tender! Even my picky toddler loved it. 03 of 08 Photo by  Paula 03/18/2023 I followed the recipe exactly and am super surprised at how good this turned out with so few ingredients. And my Instant Pot made it super easy and fast. 04 of 08 Photo by  Rob Wills 11/07/2020 05 of 08 Photo by  esther 07/09/2020 06 of 08 Photo by  1963cstrong 03/22/2020 Great recipe. I didnt use beer, I used beef stock. Everyone loved it. 07 of 08 Photo by  Barbara Wilson Stender 03/19/2018 08 of 08 Photo by  Christina 01/13/2017 1 You’ll Also Love Sous Vide Corned Beef 4 Ratings Instant Pot Guinness Corned Beef 32 Ratings Slow Cooker Guinness Corned Beef and Veggies 172 Ratings Dutch Oven Crunchy Corned Beef 6 Ratings Instant Pot Corned Beef 229 Ratings Easy Sous Vide Corned Beef Shepherd's Pie V 142 Ratings Slow Cooker Irish Beef Stew 7 Ratings Braised Corned Beef Brisket 1,057 Ratings Spicy and Tender Corned Beef 28 Ratings Irish Boiled Dinner (Corned Beef) 190 Ratings Secrets to the Perfect St. Paddy's Day Corned Beef and Cabbage Corned Beef Roast 69 Ratings Instant Pot Shepherd's Pie 58 Ratings Irish Beef Stew 142 Ratings Guinness Irish Stew 29 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
